ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule to prevent CSE Handoff error
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Sales_Engineer__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "3 - Technical Evaluation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "4 - Business Evaluation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "5 - Legal/Procurement"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "6 - Signature"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "7W - Closed Won") ) )
